content: amounts divide the amount of yarn you have in 2 and use the first half up to the end of section 2 half way through the shawl **gauge** after blocking 17 st and 28 row 14 garter ridges in 10 cm 4 gauge is not important for this shawl but it can affect the final dimensions **dimensions** after blocking 400 m shawl approximately 185 cm 72 wingspan and 47 cm 18 ½ spine if you use instagram please use the tag #escandashawl or #chalescanda when you post project photos or tag me @tejereningles if you have any queries about the pattern you can write in the tejer en inglés 6 group in ravelry or write to me at the email address given in the pattern 1 https //barcelonaknits com/ 2 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/yarnitas-lush-sock 3 https //www ravelry com/groups/tejer-en-ingles 4 https //barcelonaknits com/ 5 https //www ravelry com/yarns/library/yarnitas-lush-sock 6 https //www ravelry com/groups/tejer-en-ingles
